author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 65-year-old labourer was sentenced to life by the Mahila Court Judge Thirunavakarasu on Monday for murdering a woman relative of the same age last year due to a property dispute.

The labourer Kaliappan of Vaikalmedu murdered the Palaniammal, who was the mother of his daughter’s co-sister in the wake of a quarrel over property-sharing. Palaniammal of Pugalendhi street was found hacked to death near the Thadapalli canal.
title: 65-year-old labourer sentenced to life
